general.description: This is the headquarters of all spaceborne Soromid military operations. It was dedicated in memory of the Soromid's original homeworld, Sorom. Th√¥ the Incident happened years ago and some Soromid are too young to remember their planet of origin, the emotional attachment is shared among young and old alike.
general.bar: The spacedock bar, if you can even call it that, is just a modest section of a larger facility that's used for all sorts of military-to-civilian business, such as recruitment procedures. The place is always busy. Memory of Sorom is not a place for anyone to relax.
